usablelenses: PENTAX KAF3, KAF2, KAF, and KA (K mount, 35mm screw-mount, 645/67 med format lenses useable w adapter and/or restrictions)
exposurebracketing: 3 frames, up to +/- 3 EV in 1/3 or 1/2 steps
filefoldercustomization: Folder name (standard, date), create new folder, embed copyright
dustremoval: Sensor movement w SP coating on low pass filter
powersource: Rechargeable Li-Ion battery D-LI109 (included), AA battery holder D-BH109 for 4* AA batteries (sold separately)
focuspointadjustment: Auto 11 pt., Auto 5 pt., User-Selectable (w Expanded Area AF), Center
digitallevel: Viewfinder (horizontal), LCD (horizontal, vertical), SR auto-level function
customimagemodes: Bright, Natural, Portrait, Landscape, Vibrant, Radiant, Muted, Bleach Bypass, Reversal Film, Monochrome, Cross Processing
autopicturemodes: Standard, Portrait, Landscape, Macro, Moving Object, Night Scene Portrait, Night Scene, Blue Sky, Forest
primaryconstructionmaterials: Reinforced polycarbonate over stainless steel chassis
shutterspeed: Auto: 1/6000 to 30 sec., Manual: 1/6000 to 30 sec. (1/3EV steps or 1/2EV steps), Bulb.
fileformats: RAW (DNG), JPG (EXIF 2.3), DCF 2.0 compliant, DPOF, PIM III
flashmodes: P-TTL, Red-eye Reduction, Slow-speed Sync, Trailing Curtain Sync
manualmodes: a) 3 manual settings can be configured and saved, b) Kelvin color temperatures can be selected, c) WB settings can be copied from a captured image
ruggedizedfeatures: Fully weather sealed throughout body, coldproof
afassist: Yes via dedicated LED AF assist lamp
focusmodes: AF.A (auto), AF.S (single, w focus lock, focus/shutter priority selectable), AF.C (continuous, w focus/FPS priority selectable), Manual
windows: Windows XP (SP3 or later 32-bit Home/Pro), Vista (32-bit, 64-bit), Win 7 (32-bit, 64-bit), Win 8, (can be run as a 32-bit application on any 64-bit edition of Windows).
digitalfilterscapture: Extract Color, Toy Camera, Retro, High Contrast, Shading, Invert Color, Color
bodyweight: Without battery or removable memory: 20.8 oz Loaded and ready: 22.9 oz (Li-Ion)
hdr: Auto, HDR 1, HDR 2, HDR 3, pixel alignment, exposure bracket +/- 1-3 EV (1/1 steps)
type: Electronically controlled, vertical-run, focal plane shutter
scenemodes: Portrait, Landscape, Macro, Moving Object, Night Scene Portrait, Sunset, Blue Sky, Forest, Night Scene, Night Scene HDR (JPG), Night Snap, Food, Pet, Kids, Surf & Snow, Backlight Silhouette, Candlelight, Stage Lighting, Museum
modeselection: Single frame, Multi-image display (4, 9, 16, 36, 81 segmentation), Display magnification (up to 16x, scrolling and quick magnification available), rotating, histogram, bright/dark area warning, copyright display, calendar filmstrip, display, folder display, slideshow, Eye-Fi transfer
playbacktime: Li-Ion approx. 270 min, AA lithium approx. 560 min
typeconstruction: PENTAX KAF2 bayonet stainless steel mount
recordableimages: Li-Ion approx. 480 (410 w 50% flash, CIPA), AA lithium approx. 1250 (710 w 50% flash, CIPA)
pasmb: P, A, S, M, B (extended modes Sv, TAv)
